mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO faq_med_case ( name,
descript,
cd_med_asse, id_org, fg_active, fg_public, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name},
#{descript},
#{cdMedAsse}, #{idOrg}, #{fgActive}, #{fgPublic}, #{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )
INSERT INTO faq_med_case_text(id_med_case , content) VALUES (#{idMedCase},#{content}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE content = #{content}

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_guide(id_med_case, guide_content, guide_notes_url) VALUES (#{idMedCase}, #{guideContent}, #{guideNotesUrl}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE guide_content = #{guideContent}, guide_notes_url = #{guideNotesUrl}
INSERT INTO faq_med_case_pic(id_med_case , id_media) VALUES (#{idMedCase},#{idMedia}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id_media = #{idMedia}

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_patient ( id_med_case, name, sex, age, complaint ) VALUES ( #{idMedCase}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{complaint} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, complaint = #{complaint}

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inques_list ( id_med_case, id_inques_ca, id_inques, des_inques, id_answer, des_answer, is_masculine, id_media,
fg_reason,
fg_back,
des_expert, fg_carried, sd_inques_label, id_inques_pre, id_inques_pre2, id_inques_pre3, id_inques_pre4, id_inques_pre5 ) VALUES ( #{idMedCase}, #{idInquesCa}, #{idInques}, #{desInques}, #{idAnswer}, #{desAnswer}, #{isMasculine}, #{idMedia},
#{fgReason},
#{fgBack},
#{desExpert}, #{fgCarried}, #{sdInquesLabel}, #{idInquesPre}, #{idInquesPre2}, #{idInquesPre3}, #{idInquesPre4}, #{idInquesPre5} )

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inspect_list ( id_med_case, id_inspect, id_inspect_item, na_item,
na_short,
des_stand, id_result, is_masculine, val_result, des_result,
id_media,
cost_money,
cost_time,
fg_show, fg_reason, fg_back,
des_expert,
fg_carried ) VALUES ( #{idMedCase}, #{idInspect}, #{idInspectItem}, #{naItem},
#{naShort},
#{desStand}, #{idResult}, #{isMasculine,}, #{valResult}, #{desResult},
#{idMedia},
#{costMoney},
#{costTime},
#{fgShow}, #{fgReason}, #{fgBack},
#{desExpert},
#{fgCarried} )

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_body_list (
id_med_case,
id_body_ca,
id_body,
des_body,
sd_body,
cd_check,
id_result,
des_result,
id_media,
fg_reason,
fg_back,
des_expert,
fg_carried,
fg_valid,
) VALUES (
#{idMedCase},
#{idBodyCa},
#{idBody},
#{desBody},
#{sdBody},
#{cdCheck},
#{idResult},
#{desResult},
#{idMedia},
#{fgReason},
#{fgBack},
#{desExpert},
#{fgCarried},
#{fgValid},
)

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_body ( id_med_case, id_media_front, id_media_back, id_media_chest, id_media_abdomen, id_media_head ) VALUES (#{idMedCase}, #{idMediaFront}, #{idMediaBack}, #{idMediaChest}, #{idMediaAbdomen}, #{idMediaHead}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
id_media_front = #{idMediaFront},
id_media_back = #{idMediaBack},

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inques_list( id_med_case , id_inques_ca , id_inques , des_inques , id_answer , des_answer , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert ) VALUES
(#{item.idMedCase}, #{item.idInquesCa}, #{item.idInques}, #{item.desInques}, #{item.idAnswer}, #{item.desAnswer}, #{item.idMedia}, #{item.fgReason}, #{item.fgBack}, #{item.desExpert})

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_body_list( id_med_case , id_body_ca , id_body , des_body , sd_body , cd_check , id_result , des_result , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert ) VALUES
(#{item.idMedCase}, #{item.idBodyCa}, #{item.idBody}, #{item.desBody}, #{item.sdBody}, #{item.cdCheck}, #{item.idResult}, #{item.desResult}, #{item.idMedia}, #{item.fgReason}, #{item.fgBack}, #{item.desExpert})

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inspect_list( id_med_case , id_inspect , id_inspect_item , na_item , na_short , des_stand , id_result , val_result , des_result , id_media , cost_money , cost_time , fg_show , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert ) VALUES
(#{item.idMedCase}, #{item.idInspect}, #{item.idInspectItem}, #{item.naItem}, #{item.naShort}, #{item.desStand}, #{item.idResult}, #{item.valResult}, #{item.desResult}, #{item.idMedia}, #{item.costMoney}, #{item.costTime}, #{item.fgShow}, #{item.fgReason}, #{item.fgBack}, #{item.desExpert})

INSERT INTO faq_med_case( name , descript , cd_med_asse , id_org , count , fg_active , fg_valid , creator , gmt_create , operator , gmt_modify , fg_public ) select #{name} , descript , cd_med_asse , #{idOrg} , '0' , fg_active , fg_valid , #{creator} , now(), #{creator} , now() , '0' from faq_med_case where id_med_case = #{idMedCase}
INSERT INTO faq_med_case_text(id_med_case , content) SELECT #{idMedCase},content FROM faq_med_case_text WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase}
INSERT INTO faq_med_case_guide(id_med_case , guide_content, guide_notes_url) SELECT #{idMedCase}, guide_content, guide_notes_url FROM faq_med_case_guide WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase}
INSERT INTO faq_med_case_pic(id_med_case , id_media) SELECT #{idMedCase},id_media FROM faq_med_case_pic WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase}
INSERT INTO faq_med_case_patient(id_med_case, name, sex,age, complaint) SELECT #{idMedCase}, name, sex,age, complaint FROM faq_med_case_patient WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase}

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inques_list( id_med_case , id_inques_ca , id_inques , des_inques , id_answer , des_answer , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , fg_carried ) SELECT #{idMedCase}, id_inques_ca , id_inques , des_inques , id_answer , des_answer , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , fg_carried FROM faq_med_case_inques_list WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase} AND fg_valid = '0'

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_body_list( id_med_case , id_body_ca , id_body , des_body , sd_body , cd_check , id_result , des_result , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , fg_carried , fg_valid ) SELECT #{idMedCase}, id_body_ca , id_body , des_body , sd_body , cd_check , id_result , des_result , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , fg_carried , fg_valid FROM faq_med_case_body_list WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase} AND fg_valid = '0'

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inspect_list( id_med_case , id_inspect , id_inspect_item , na_item , na_short , des_stand , id_result , val_result , des_result , id_media , cost_money , cost_time , fg_show , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , fg_carried , fg_valid ) SELECT #{idMedCase}, id_inspect , id_inspect_item , na_item , na_short , des_stand , id_result , val_result , des_result , id_media , cost_money , cost_time , fg_show , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , fg_carried , fg_valid FROM faq_med_case_inspect_list WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase} AND fg_valid = '0'

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_body( id_med_case , id_media_front , id_media_back , id_media_chest , id_media_abdomen , id_media_head ) SELECT #{idMedCase}, id_media_front , id_media_back , id_media_chest , id_media_abdomen , id_media_head FROM faq_med_case_body WHERE id_med_case = #{oldIdMedCase}

INSERT INTO med.faq_med_case_inques_list( id_med_case , id_inques_ca , id_inques , des_inques , id_answer , des_answer ,
id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert , sd_inques_label , id_inques_pre , id_inques_pre2 , id_inques_pre3 , id_inques_pre4 , id_inques_pre5 ) SELECT #{idMedCase} , a.id_inques_ca , a.id_inques , a.des_inques , b.id_answer , b.des_answer , b.id_media , b.fg_reason , b.fg_back , b.des_expert , a.sd_inques_label , a.id_inques_pre , a.id_inques_pre2 , a.id_inques_pre3 , a.id_inques_pre4 , a.id_inques_pre5 FROM bas_inques a LEFT JOIN bas_inques_answer b ON a.id_inques = b.id_inques AND b.fg_default = '1' AND b.fg_active = '1' AND b.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.fg_active = '1' AND a.fg_valid = '0' AND b.id_answer IS NOT NULL

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_body_list( id_med_case , id_body_ca , id_body , des_body , sd_body , cd_check , id_result , des_result , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert ) SELECT #{idMedCase} , a.id_body_ca , a.id_body , a.des_body , a.sd_body , a.cd_check , b.id_result , b.des_result , b.id_media , b.fg_reason , b.fg_back , b.des_expert FROM bas_body a LEFT JOIN bas_body_result b ON a.id_body = b.id_body AND b.fg_default = '1' AND b.fg_active = '1' AND b.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.fg_active = '1' AND a.fg_valid = '0' AND b.id_result IS NOT NULL

INSERT INTO faq_med_case_inspect_list( id_med_case , id_inspect , id_inspect_item , na_item , na_short , des_stand , id_result , val_result , des_result , id_media , cost_money , cost_time , fg_show , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert ) SELECT #{idMedCase} , a.id_inspect , a.id_inspect_item , a.na_item , a.na_short , a.des_stand , b.id_result , b.val_result , b.des_result , b.id_media , b.cost_money , b.cost_time , b.fg_show , b.fg_reason , b.fg_back , b.des_expert FROM bas_inspect_item a LEFT JOIN bas_item_result b ON a.id_inspect_item = b.id_inspect_item AND b.fg_default = '1' AND b.fg_active = '1' AND b.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.fg_active = '1' AND a.fg_valid = '0' AND b.id_result IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE faq_med_case SET name = #{name}, descript = #{descript}, cd_med_asse = #{cdMedAsse}, fg_active = #{fgActive}, operator = #{operator}, gmt_modify = now() WHERE id_med_case = #{idMedCase}

UPDATE faq_med_case_inques_list SET id_med_case = #{idMedCase}, id_inques_ca = #{idInquesCa}, id_inques = #{idInques}, des_inques = #{desInques}, id_answer = #{idAnswer}, des_answer = #{desAnswer}, is_masculine = #{isMasculine}, id_media = #{idMedia}, fg_reason = #{fgReason}, fg_back = #{fgBack}, des_expert = #{desExpert}, fg_carried = #{fgCarried}, sd_inques_label = #{sdInquesLabel}, id_inques_pre = #{idInquesPre}, id_inques_pre2 = #{idInquesPre2}, id_inques_pre3 = #{idInquesPre3}, id_inques_pre4 = #{idInquesPre4}, id_inques_pre5 = #{idInquesPre5} WHERE id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}

UPDATE faq_med_case_inspect_list SET id_med_case = #{idMedCase}, id_inspect = #{idInspect}, id_inspect_item = #{idInspectItem}, na_item = #{naItem}, na_short = #{naShort}, des_stand = #{desStand}, id_result = #{idResult}, is_masculine = #{isMasculine}, val_result = #{valResult}, des_result = #{desResult}, id_media = #{idMedia}, cost_money = #{costMoney}, cost_time = #{costTime}, fg_show = #{fgShow}, fg_reason = #{fgReason}, fg_back = #{fgBack}, des_expert = #{desExpert}, fg_carried = #{fgCarried} WHERE id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}

UPDATE faq_med_case_body_list SET id_med_case = #{idMedCase}, id_body_ca = #{idBodyCa}, id_body = #{idBody}, des_body = #{desBody}, sd_body = #{sdBody}, cd_check = #{cdCheck}, id_result = #{idResult}, des_result = #{desResult}, id_media = #{idMedia}, fg_reason = #{fgReason}, fg_back = #{fgBack}, des_expert = #{desExpert}, fg_carried = #{fgCarried} WHERE id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
mapper.select: select id_med_case,content from faq_med_case_text where id_med_case = #{idMedCase}
select id_med_case, guide_content, guide_notes_url from faq_med_case_guide where id_med_case = #{idMedCase}
select fmca.id_med_case,fmca.id_media,bm.path from faq_med_case_pic fmca left join bas_media bm on fmca.id_media = bm.id_media where fmca.id_med_case = #{idMedCase}
select id_med_case, name, sex, age, complaint from faq_med_case_patient where id_med_case = #{idMedCase}

SELECT fmci.id_med_case_list,fmci.id_med_case, fmci.id_inspect, fmci.id_inspect_item, fmci.na_item, fmci.na_short, fmci.des_stand, fmci.id_result, fmci.val_result, fmci.des_result, fmci.id_media, fmci.cost_money, fmci.cost_time, fmci.fg_show, fmci.fg_reason, fmci.fg_back, fmci.des_expert, fmci.fg_carried FROM faq_med_case_inspect_list fmci WHERE fmci.id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList} AND fmci.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT fmci.id_med_case_list, fmci.id_med_case, fmci.id_inques_ca, fmci.id_inques, fmci.des_inques, fmci.id_answer, fmci.des_answer, fmci.id_media, fmci.fg_reason, fmci.fg_back, fmci.des_expert, fmci.fg_carried FROM faq_med_case_inques_list fmci WHERE fmci.id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList} AND fmci.fg_valid = '0'

SELECT fmcbl.id_med_case_list, fmcbl.id_med_case, fmcbl.id_body_ca, fmcbl.id_body, fmcbl.des_body, fmcbl.sd_body, fmcbl.cd_check, fmcbl.id_result, fmcbl.des_result, fmcbl.id_media, fmcbl.fg_reason, fmcbl.fg_back, fmcbl.des_expert, fmcbl.fg_carried, fmcbl.fg_valid FROM faq_med_case_body_list fmcbl WHERE fmcbl.id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
select id_med_case, id_media_front, id_media_back, id_media_chest, id_media_abdomen, id_media_head from faq_med_case_body where id_med_case = #{idMedCase}
SELECT id_med_case , id_inques_ca , id_inques , des_inques , id_answer , des_answer , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert FROM faq_med_case_inques_list WHERE id_med_case = #{idMedCase}

SELECT #{idMedCase} as idMedCase , a.id_inques_ca , a.id_inques , a.des_inques , b.id_answer , b.des_answer , b.id_media , b.fg_reason , b.fg_back , b.des_expert FROM bas_inques a LEFT JOIN bas_inques_answer b ON a.id_inques = b.id_inques AND b.fg_default = '1' AND b.fg_active = '1' AND b.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.fg_active = '1' AND a.fg_valid = '0' AND b.id_answer is not null

SELECT id_med_case , id_body_ca , id_body , des_body , sd_body , cd_check , id_result , des_result , id_media , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert FROM faq_med_case_body_list WHERE id_med_case = #{idMedCase}

SELECT #{idMedCase} as idMedCase,a.id_body_ca,a.id_body,a.des_body,a.sd_body,a.cd_check, b.id_result,b.des_result,b.id_media,b.fg_reason,b.fg_back,b.des_expert FROM bas_body a LEFT JOIN bas_body_result b ON a.id_body = b.id_body AND b.fg_default = '1' AND b.fg_active = '1' AND b.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.fg_active = '1' AND a.fg_valid = '0' AND b.id_result is not null

SELECT id_med_case , id_inspect , id_inspect_item , na_item , na_short , des_stand , id_result , val_result , des_result , id_media , cost_money , cost_time , fg_show , fg_reason , fg_back , des_expert FROM faq_med_case_inspect_list WHERE id_med_case = #{idMedCase}

SELECT #{idMedCase} as idMedCase,a.id_inspect,a.id_inspect_item,a.na_item,a.na_short,a.des_stand, b.id_result,b.val_result,b.des_result,b.id_media,b.cost_money,b.cost_time, b.fg_show,b.fg_reason,b.fg_back,b.des_expert FROM bas_inspect_item a LEFT JOIN bas_item_result b ON a.id_inspect_item = b.id_inspect_item AND b.fg_default = '1' AND b.fg_active = '1' AND b.fg_valid = '0' WHERE a.fg_active = '1' AND a.fg_valid = '0' AND b.id_result is not null
SELECT id_inques_pre , id_inques_pre2 , id_inques_pre3 , id_inques_pre4 , id_inques_pre5 , id_med_case FROM faq_med_case_inques_list WHERE id_med_case_list = #{idMedCaseList}
